sn27.3:1.2: “Mendicants, desire and greed for eye consciousness,
sn27.3:1.7: or mind consciousness is a corruption of the mind.
sn27.3:1.8: When a mendicant has given up mental corruption in these six cases, their mind inclines to renunciation.
sn27.3:1.9: A mind imbued with renunciation is said to be fit for work regarding anything that can be realized by insight.”
